name: Take Yutaka GI Memory
overview: Take Yutaka GI Memory is a horseracing simulation game endorsed by professional jockey Yutaka Take who rose to fame after winning a hundred races before he turned 20, including the Kikuka-shou GI race in 1988. The game's story mode revisits a lot of his famous races, while others allow the player to forge their own path in raising and racing horses.
